Flying
Outlast {WB} [i]({WB}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)[/i]
As long as Exiler's Vulpikeet has a counter on it, it has vigilance.
rules_text2: Untap target tapped creature you control, it deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. A creature dealt damage this way loses indestructible and can't regenerate until end of turn.
